abstract: Exelon chief executive John Rowe says he’s not backing down from seeking buyout prospects despite 3 consecutive failed buyout attempts, The Chicago Tribune reported.
snippet: Exelon chief executive John Rowe says he’s not backing down from seeking buyout prospects despite 3 consecutive failed buyout attempts, The Chicago Tribune reported.
lead_paragraph: Exelon‘s chief executive, John Rowe, says he’s not backing down from seeking buyout prospects despite three consecutive failed buyout attempts, The Chicago Tribune reported.

headline.main: Exelon Head Still Looking for Other Takeovers
